General.Name: Empresa Electrica de Magallanes SA
General.Description: Empresa Eléctrica de Magallanes S.A. engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and supply of electricity in Chile. It operates thermal generating plants with capacity of 122 MW. The company was founded in 1897 and is based in Punta Arenas, Chile. Empresa Eléctrica de Magallanes S.A. is a subsidiary of CGE Magallanes S.A.

2.Name: Mr. Juan  Pereira Derch
2.Title: Head of the Energy Regulation & Research Division

3.Name: Mr. Juan Carlos  Würth Ojeda
3.Title: Head of the Energy Generation Division
